scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan migrate
scripts.migrate:fresh: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.migrate:seed: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan db:seed
scripts.key:generate: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan key:generate
scripts.cache:clear: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan cache:clear
scripts.config:clear: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan config:clear
scripts.route:clear: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan route:clear
scripts.view:clear: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan view:clear
scripts.optimize: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan optimize
scripts.test: docker-compose exec -T app php artisan test
scripts.tinker: docker-compose exec app php artisan tinker
scripts.setup: npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.fresh: npm run migrate:fresh && npm run seed
